questions.question: Considering the overall design, what is the most apparent purpose of this product, based on its visual features and labeling?
What is the primary color of the illustrated fruit on the label, suggesting a potential flavor or scent?
What material is the transparent outer casing of the product primarily constructed from, based on its visual appearance?
What shape best describes the overall form of the product's main container, excluding the attached clip?
Describing the texture of the product inside the bottle, based on the image, what is its likely consistency?
What is the predominant color of the text and branding on the product's label?
What type of attachment is visible at the top of the container, seemingly intended for portability?
What is the material of the carrying clip attached to the top of the hand sanitizer container?
Disregarding the text, what is the shape of the secondary fruit illustration, contrasting with the primary fruit?
What is the color of the secondary fruit illustration on the label, contrasting with the main illustration?
What is the color of the background behind the brand name and fruit illustration on the label?
Considering the text on the product label, what word describes the product's function?
What word best describes the form of the packaging, referring to its overall shape and profile?

What is the color of the smaller, circular graphic on the label indicating the scent?
